Name: Automation Node Event Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the messages for Automation node related events.

NodeIdle.LongDescription: This message shall indicate that a node `NodeState` property transitions to `Idle`.
NodeIdle.Message: The node with Id '%1' is idle.
ArgDescriptions: The `Id` of the node that is idle.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the node resource that is idle.

NodeWaiting.LongDescription: This message shall indicate that a node `NodeState` property transitioned to `Waiting`.
NodeWaiting.Message: The node with Id '%1' is waiting.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the node resource that is waiting.

NodeRunning.LongDescription: This message shall indicate that a node `NodeState` property transitioned to one of the `Running` states.
NodeRunning.Message: The node with Id '%1' is running.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the node resource that is running.

NodeDone.LongDescription: This message shall indicate that a node `NodeState` property transitioned to `Done`.
NodeDone.Message: The node with Id '%1' is done running.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the node resource that is done running.

NodeStoppedCondition.Description: A node has stopped because of conditions.
NodeStoppedCondition.LongDescription: This message shall indicate that a node has stopped and the `NodeState` property transitioned to `ConditionStop`.
NodeStoppedCondition.Message: The node with Id '%1' has stopped because of conditions.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the node resource that has stopped.

NodeStoppedError.Description: A node has stopped with warnings or errors.
NodeStoppedError.LongDescription: This message shall indicate that a node has stopped and the `NodeState` property transitioned to `ErrorStop`.
NodeStoppedError.Message: The node with Id '%1' has stopped with warnings or errors.
ArgLongDescriptions: This argument shall contain the value of the `Id` property of the node resource that has stopped.
